QuestData.Title: Your Presence is Required at Stars' Rest
QuestData.Description: $C, I know these tuskarr will ask you to do many favors for them, but you must get to Stars' Rest with all due haste!$B$BThe upheaval in the land this morning is sure to have broader repercussions than just inconveniencing the natives.$B$BStars' Rest is westward past the intersection of the road leading north out of the harbor. There is an archmage there named Modera. She will be expecting you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the Image of Archmage Modera at Stars' Rest.
QuestData.RewardText: I've been expecting you, $c. We have much work to do, you and I.
